bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with bai zhen 白疹 , white papules. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry wu lan si can 烏爛 死蠶 quoting Ben cao shi yi 本草拾遺 : 白死蠶主白游，赤死蠶主赤游，並塗之。游，一名疹 也 , “White dead silkworms control white roaming, red dead silkworms control red roaming. For both they are to be applied externally. Another designation of you is zhen , papules”, writes: 白死者主白游疹 , 赤死者主赤游疹 , “White dead ones control white roaming papules ; red dead ones master red roaming papules”.
